name: Number of UNI/ENNI Terminations
title: NUT
definition: Reflects the number of UNI/ENNI termination occurrences being affected by the service request.
validEntryNotes: When the EVCI field on the ASR form is “B” the quantity of “01” is not valid.
usageNotes: Optional when the ACT field on the ASR Form is “D”, otherwise required.
